channel.title: Zero or negative login size error
channel.description:
For the past 3 days I've been trying to fix this error, I don't know how this occured but it seems NONE of my players INCLUDING myself can get on. I checked my VPS and noticed it, So I checked my firewall and problem solved all possible solutions and nothing fixed it. Now I've lost tons of players and my whole community to this weird error I can't manage to fix. I've read that it is caused by your connection but I fixed that already. It has also been a issue with many when there buying things in the shop since it disconnects them off and they are not able to log back in. So it might be a problem with ShopAssistant also but I'm not sure it is, Feel free to pm me for helping me or replying below. I'm kinda a noob to so please don't troll a noob learning how to fix things like this :L. I do have Teamviewer if someone is interested in fixing it that way but please bring that to private chat only....
Here is a picture of whats happening. (I hide my IP but it was showing - This is a TrisidiaX V3 base also I've been working on) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tnnv8RD.png[/img] Lmao my Grammar is so bad. Help me sooon! I still have a few loyal players :c I'm not much a forum person and its rare for me to even resort to this.
ADD: Also got proof that this is a ShopAssistant issue also. Proof: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cyq4Bub.png[/img]
I reseted my ShopAssistant to a previous update, I'll see if that helps a bit.

item.title: Zero or negative login size error
item.dc:creator: @demen12 demen12
item.description:
@demen12 wrote:

Okay Anyone else able to help me out? I really don’t want to delete my source.

Read full topic
